authors: Radek G. - based on Achtung Cthulhu character sheet by Rob heath
instructions: # Shadows Of Esteren Character Sheet.## Very rudementary but with some automation## Set Player's Health Condition like it would be NPC with X(G)\Y(O)\Z(B)\V(C) system.## Potential Base is automatically calculated whenever you change Creativity.## Penalty is automatically calculated whenever Player's Health Condition changes or any of G\O\B\V values.
